name: a*srfa
description: Specific absorption coefficient of Suwanee River Fulvic Acid standard

name: abs_blank_ad
description: Absorbance of a blank (or unused) filter pad for non-algal detritus.

name: abs_blank_ag
description: Absorbance of a blank (or unused) filter pad for Gelbstoff.

name: abs_blank_ap
description: Absorbance of a blank (or unused) filter pad for particles.

name: abs_nacl
description: Absorbance of NaCl solution (use with the _###ppt suffix)

name: abundance
description: Number of cells observed (to specify a particular taxonomic type, see "_abun" in Table of Field Name Suffixes)

name: ad_unc
description: Accumulated estimate of standard uncertainty associated with the derivation of the absorption coefficient of non-algal detritus (ad) via error propogation through the absoption equation. See section 5.3.3 of NASA and IOCCG's "Inherent Optical Property Measurements and Protocols: Absorption Coefficient" (2017).

name: adg
description: Absorption coefficient of non-algal detritus + Gelbstoff (ad + ag)

name: agp
description: Absorption coefficient of Gelbstoff + particles (ag + ap)

name: AMC
description: Concentration of 7-Amino-4-methylcoumarin's fluorescent molecules without an associated substrate (used for the calibration curve in flow cytometry).

name: AMC-Leu
description: Rate of substrate cleavage for L-Leucine-7-amido-4-methylcoumarin hydrochloride

name: AOT
description: Aerosol Optical Thickness (sometimes referred to as tau or taua)

name: ap_unc
description: Accumulated estimate of standard uncertainty associated with the derivation of the absorption coefficient of particles (ap) via error propogation through the absoption equation. See section 5.3.3 of NASA and IOCCG's "Inherent Optical Property Measurements and Protocols: Absorption Coefficient" (2017).

name: aph_unc
description: Accumulated estimate of standard uncertainty associated with the derivation of the absorption coefficient of phytoplankton (aph) via error propogation through the absoption equation. See section 5.3.3 of NASA and IOCCG's "Inherent Optical Property Measurements and Protocols: Absorption Coefficient" (2017).

name: asrfa
description: Absorption coefficient of Suwanee River Fulvic Acid standard

name: associated_file_types
description: File type of an associated file. Please contact SeaBASS staff before using this field to verify that your file type is supported. Valid entries for this field are: DNA-FASTQ, DNA-FASTA (for files relating to DNA analysis), BENTHIC (for images relating to benthic type and cover), and PLANKTONIC (for images relating to flow cam imagery or phytoplankton taxonomic types). If multiple entries are applicable, separate them with the pipe character: | To be used with field: associated_files

name: associated_files
description: File name of an associated file. Must be used with associated_file_type. Please include the file suffix in the entry. If multiple entries are applicable, separate them with the pipe character: | To be used with field: associated_file_type If individual files are referenced but are part of a TAR archive bundle, be sure to use the associated_archives and associated_archive_types headers.

name: bbp_bp
description: Ratio of the backscattering coefficient of particles (bbp) to the total backscattering coefficient (bp)

name: benthic_type
description: Description of the benthic seafloor community or substrate.

name: bin_depth
description: Nominal or center depth for each data bin

name: bin_diameter_center
description: size bin limit for particle size distribution measurements (e.g. for coulter counter)

name: bin_diameter_lower
description: size bin limit for particle size distribution measurements (e.g. for coulter counter)

name: bin_diameter_upper
description: size bin limit for particle size distribution measurements (e.g. for coulter counter)

name: bincount
description: Number of records averaged into a bin or reported measurement

name: biotic_class
description: Biotic Class, Biotic Component, level 2 (CMECS Units, entry value should be text that does NOT contain the file's delimiter)

name: biotic_community
description: Biotic Community, Biotic Component, level 5 (CMECS Units, entry value should be text that does NOT contain the file's delimiter)

name: biotic_group
description: Biotic Group, Biotic Component, level 4 (CMECS Units, entry value should be text that does NOT contain the file's delimiter)

name: biotic_setting
description: Biotic Setting, Biotic Component, level 1 (CMECS Units, entry value should be text that does NOT contain the file's delimiter)

name: biotic_subclass
description: Biotic Subclass, Biotic Component, level 3 (CMECS Units, entry value should be text that does NOT contain the file's delimiter)

name: bottle
description: Number used to identify a specific bottle within an array of bottle samples collected

name: C2H3N_H
description: VOCC concentration of (C2H3N)H+ in the air evolved from the experimental chambers that are measured by the PTR-TOF/MS. Use with headers /chemical_formula= and /mass_to_charge=.

name: C2H4O_H
description: VOCC concentration of (C2H4O)H+ in the air evolved from the experimental chambers that are measured by the PTR-TOF/MS. Use with headers /chemical_formula= and /mass_to_charge=.

name: C2H6S_H
description: VOCC concentration of (C2H6S)H+ in the air evolved from the experimental chambers that are measured by the PTR-TOF/MS. Use with headers /chemical_formula= and /mass_to_charge=.

name: C3H6O_H
description: VOCC concentration of (C3H6O)H+ in the air evolved from the experimental chambers that are measured by the PTR-TOF/MS. Use with headers /chemical_formula= and /mass_to_charge=.

name: C5H8_H
description: VOCC concentration of (C5H8)H+ in the air evolved from the experimental chambers that are measured by the PTR-TOF/MS. Use with headers /chemical_formula= and /mass_to_charge=.

name: C6H6_H
description: VOCC concentration of (C6H6)H+ in the air evolved from the experimental chambers that are measured by the PTR-TOF/MS. Use with headers /chemical_formula= and /mass_to_charge=.

name: cdmf
description: CDOM fluorescence (may be used in combination with suffixes _ex### and/or _em###, like so: cdmf_ex###_em###; ex = excitation wavelength; em = emission wavelength)

name: cdom
description: Concentration of chromophoric dissolved organic matter

name: cgp
description: Attenuation coefficient of Gelbstoff + particles (c - cw = agp + bp)

name: CH4O_H
description: VOCC concentration of (CH4O)H+ in the air evolved from the experimental chambers that are measured by the PTR-TOF/MS. Use with headers /chemical_formula= and /mass_to_charge=.

name: CH4S_H
description: VOCC concentrations of (CH4S)H+ in the air evolved from the experimental chambers that are measured by the PTR-TOF/MS. Use with headers /chemical_formula= and /mass_to_charge=.

name: Chl_a
description: HPLC Chlorophyll a (MV_Chl_a plus allomers and epimers)

name: Chl_ex
description: Chlorophyll a derived via experiment, or experimental methods. See specific documentation for more information.

name: Chl_stimf
description: Chlorophyll a derived from a calibrated in situ fluorometer

name: cnw
description: Attenuation coefficient of Gelbstoff + particles (obsolete; see cgp)

name: cp
description: Beam attenuation coefficient of particles (ap + bp)

name: cw
description: Beam attenuation coefficient of water (aw + bw)

name: cycle
description: Incrementing counter describing the sampling interval of the instrument. Relevant to the PTR-TOF/MS.

name: DMSA
description: Concentration of dimethyl sulfide (DMS) in the atmosphere

name: DMSSW
description: Concentration of dimethyl sulfide (DMS) in sea water

name: DNA
description: DNA (DeoxyriboNucleic Acid) concentration within a water volume

name: DP
description: Total diagnostic pigments (PSC + Allo + Zea + Tot_Chl_b)

name: EdGND
description: Dark current values for Ed sensor

name: Elw
description: Downwelling irradiance over the infrared spectrum, 3 to 40 um

name: EsGND
description: Dark current values for Es sensor

name: Esun
description: Downwelling sun irradiance (direct normal solar irradiance)

name: Esw
description: Downwelling irradiance over the solar spectrum, 0.3 to 3 um

name: EuGND
description: Dark current values for Eu sensor

name: F-initial
description: Minimum fluorescence in darkness. Fast Repetition Rate Fluorescence measurement, commonly abbreviated as F0

name: FL-A
description: Area of the signal of emission by flourescence (flow cytometry). May be used with _ex###_em### field modifiers.

name: FL-H
description: Height of the signal of emission by flourescence (flow cytometry). May be used with _ex###_em### field modifiers.

name: Fm
description: Maximum fluorescence in darkness. Fast Repetition Rate Fluorescence measurement

name: FSC-A
description: Area of the signal of light scattered in the forward direction from the laser interrogating particles (flow cytometry).

name: FSC-H
description: Height of the signal of light scattered in the forward direction from the laser interrogating particles (flow cytometry).

name: FSCperp-H
description: Height of the signal of light that has been depolarized from the original polarization of the laser interrogating particles (flow cytometry).

name: Fv_Fm
description: Maximum photochemical efficiency. Fast Repetition Rate Fluorescence measurement, commonly abbreviated as Fv/Fm

name: g_herb
description: Herbivorous Grazing Rate (i.e., Herbivore Induced Mortality)

name: geoform
description: Geoform (CMECS Units, Geoform Subcomponent, entry value should be text that does NOT contain the file's delimiter)

name: geoform_origin
description: Geoform origin (CMECS Units, Geoform Subcomponent, entry value should be text that does NOT contain the file's delimiter)

name: geoform_physiographic_setting
description: Geoform Component Physiographic Setting Subcomponent (CMECS Units, entry value should be text that does NOT contain the file's delimiter)

name: geoform_tectonic_setting
description: Geoform Component Tectonic Subcomponent (CMECS Units, entry value should be text that does NOT contain the file's delimiter)

name: geoform_type
description: Geoform type (CMECS Units, Geoform Subcomponent, entry value should be text that does NOT contain the file's delimiter)

name: hplc_gsfc_id
description: NASA GSFC HPLC processing idenfication number (i.e. 'GSFC HPLC lab sampler code')

name: iso_C2H3N_H
description: VOCC concentration of (13C2H3N)H+ in the air evolved from the experimental chambers that are measured by the PTR-TOF/MS. Use with headers /chemical_formula= and /mass_to_charge=.

name: iso_C2H4O_H
description: VOCC concentration of d3-acetaldehyde (C2HD3O)H+ in the air evolved from the experimental chambers that are measured by the PTR-TOF/MS. Use with headers /chemical_formula= and /mass_to_charge=.

name: iso_C2H6S_H
description: VOCC concentration of d3-dimethylsulfide (C2D3H3S)H+ in the air evolved from the experimental chambers that are measured by the PTR-TOF/MS. Use with headers /chemical_formula= and /mass_to_charge=.

name: iso_C3H6O_H
description: VOCC concentration of d6-acetone (C3D6O)H+ in the air evolved from the experimental chambers that are measured by the PTR-TOF/MS. Use with headers /chemical_formula= and /mass_to_charge=.

name: iso_CH4O_H
description: VOCC concentration of (13CH4O)H+ in the air evolved from the experimental chambers that are measured by the PTR-TOF/MS. Use with headers /chemical_formula= and /mass_to_charge=.

name: lightlevel
description: Light sample was exposed to, relative to the ambient or experimental intensity

name: LuGND
description: Dark current values for Lu sensor

name: Lwn
description: Normalized water leaving radiance ( Lwn = Lw * F0 / Es )

name: Lwnex
description: Exact normalized water leaving radiance ( e.g., Morel et al. 2002 )

name: Mg_DVP
description: HPLC Mg 2,4 divinyl pheoporphyrin a5 monomethyl ester

name: MUF
description: Concentration of 4-Methylumbelliferone's fluorescent molecules without an associated substrate (used for the calibration curve in flow cytometry).

name: MUF-But
description: Rate of substrate cleavage for 4-Methylumbelliferyl butyrate

name: MUF-Glu
description: Rate of substrate cleavage for 4-Methylumbelliferyl beta-D-glucopyranoside

name: MUF-PO4
description: Rate of substrate cleavage for 4-Methylumbelliferyl phosphate

name: mz
description: Mass-to-charge ratio, used to describe proton-transfer-reaction time-of-flight mass spectrometer (PTR-TOF/MS) measurements

name: N2avg
description: The mean squared buoyancy frequency (Brunt–Väisälä frequency) between the surface and measurement depth

name: nadir
description: Sensor nadir angle (the nadir is the downward facing viewing geometry, opposite the zenith)

name: nanoeukaryote
description: Phytoplankton taxonomic label for nanoeukaryote. Use in combination with the supported suffixes in the Field Name Suffixes Table.

name: NCCb
description: Net Benthic Community Calcification, expressed as the millimole production of CaCO3 per benthic area per hour

name: NCPb
description: Net Benthic Community Productivity, expressed as the millimole production of O2 per benthic area per hour

name: nPF
description: Nanoplankton proportion factor ([Hex-fuco + But-fuco + Allo] / DP)

name: PAR
description: PAR measured at the sea surface

name: pCO2
description: Surface water partial pressure of carbon dioxide

name: pDrift
description: Pressure in the drift tube of the PTR-TOF/MS.

name: picoeukaryote
description: Phytoplankton taxonomic label for picoeukaryote. Use in combination with the supported Field Name Suffixes Table.

name: PPC
description: Photoprotective carotenoids (Allo + Diadino + Diato + Zeo + alpha-beta-Car)

name: prochlorococcus
description: Phytoplankton taxonomic label for prochlorococcus. Use in combination with the supported Field Name Suffixes listed in the above table, relating to taxonomic types.

name: PSD
description: Particle Size Distribution. Must be used in conjunction with a suffix to specify sizes, e.g., PSD_80.5size (see _###size in table of field name modifiers.)

name: pulse_width
description: Time duration that the primary trigger channel exceeded the width measurement threshold during an event (flow cytometry). Scientific notation is accepted.

name: Q
description: Eu / Lu (equal to pi in diffuse water)

name: RelAbundance
description: Percent cell abundance of a specific phytoplankton taxonomic type relative to all observed cells.

name: RelAz
description: Sensor azimuth angle relative to the solar plane

name: Rf
description: Raman fluorescence (may be used in combination with suffixes _ex### and/or _em###, like so: Rf_ex###_em###; ex = excitation wavelength; em = emission wavelength)

name: Rpi
description: Radiance reflectance with pi (pi * Lu / Ed)

name: S_ad
description: Slope of non-algal detritus absorption spectra

name: sig
description: Stregth of the raw signal of the sunphotometer

name: sigma_PSII
description: Effective absorption cross-section of photosystem II in darkness

name: speed_f_w
description: Speed in the forward direction, relative to water

name: SSC-A
description: Area of the signal of light side scattered from the laser interrogating particles (flow cytometry).

name: SSC-H
description: Height of the signal of light side scattered from the laser interrogating particles (flow cytometry).

name: station_alt_id
description: Alternate sample station identifier (use ONLY if station has already been used as a field name)

name: stimf
description: Stimulated fluorescence, nominally of chlorophyll a. The suffixes _ex### and _em### may be used to specify wavelengths like so: stimf_ex###_em###; ex = excitation wavelength; em = emission wavelength). Related field: Chl_stimf

name: substrate_class
description: Substrate class, Substrate Component level 2 (CMECS Units, entry value should be text that does NOT contain the file's delimiter)

name: substrate_group
description: Substrate group, Substrate Component level 4 (CMECS Units, entry value should be text that does NOT contain the file's delimiter)

name: substrate_origin
description: Substrate origin, Substrate Component level 1 (CMECS Units, entry value should be text that does NOT contain the file's delimiter)

name: substrate_subclass
description: Substrate subclass, Substrate Component level 3 (CMECS Units, entry value should be text that does NOT contain the file's delimiter)

name: substrate_subgroup
description: Substrate subgroup, Substrate Component level 5 (CMECS Units, entry value should be text that does NOT contain the file's delimiter)

name: synechococcus
description: Phytoplankton taxonomic label for synechococcus. Use in combination with the supported Field Name Suffixes listed in the above table, relating to taxonomic types.

name: Tacc
description: Total accessory pigments (PPC + PSC + Tot_Chl_b + Tot_Chl_c)

name: TauAv
description: Flourescence kinetics decay time (i.e., fluorescence lifetime of the excited photosynthetic unit)

name: Tdrift
description: Temperature in the drift tube of the PTR-TOF/MS.

name: Tot_Chl_a
description: HPLC DV_Chl_a + MV_Chl_a + Chlide_a + Chl_a_allom + Chl_a_prime

name: VOCair
description: Concenctration of Volatile Organic Carbon (VOC) compounds in air measured via a proton-transfer-reaction time-of-flight mass spectrometer (PTR-TOF/MS)

name: VSF
description: Total volume scattering function (VSF### or VSF###_YYYang, where YYY is collection angle). Also called beta.

name: VSFg
description: Gelbstoff volume scattering function, i.e., VSFg = VSFw - VSF(pure water, salinity, and temperature) (VSFg### or VSFp###_YYYang, where YYY is collection angle). Also called beta.

name: VSFp
description: Particulate volume scattering function i.e., VSFp = VSF - VSFw (VSFp### or VSFp###_YYYang, where YYY is collection angle). Also called beta.

name: VSFw
description: Filtered seawater volume scattering function plus VSF sal & temp contributions, i.e., VSFw = VSF - VSFp (VSFw### or VSFw###_YYYang, where YYY is collection angle). Also called beta.

name: water_column_biogeochemical_feature
description: Water Column Biogeochemical Feature Subcomponent (CMECS Units, entry value should be text that does NOT contain the file's delimiter)

name: water_column_hydroform
description: Water Column Hydroform Subcomponent level 2 (CMECS Units, entry value should be text that does NOT contain the file's delimiter)

name: water_column_hydroform_class
description: Water Column Hydroform Subcomponent level 1 (CMECS Units, entry value should be text that does NOT contain the file's delimiter)

name: water_column_hydroform_type
description: Water Column Hydroform Subcomponent level 3 (CMECS Units, entry value should be text that does NOT contain the file's delimiter)

name: water_column_layer
description: Water Column Layer Subcomponent (CMECS Units, entry value should be text that does NOT contain the file's delimiter)

name: water_column_salinity
description: Water Column Salinity Subcomponent (CMECS Units, entry value should be text that does NOT contain the file's delimiter)

name: water_column_temperature
description: Water Column Temperature Subcomponent (CMECS Units, entry value should be text that does NOT contain the file's delimiter)

name: water_depth
description: The water (bottom) depth where the data were collected

name: wdir
description: Wind direction, described in degrees from north, increasing clockwise

name: Z_90
description: Depth of the first optical layer (37% light level)

name: Z_DCM
description: Depth of the deep chlorophyll maximum

name: Z_XML
description: Depth of the active mixing layer
